org.codice.felix.cm.file

Class ConfigurationContextImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codice.felix.cm.file.ConfigurationContextImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationContext

    public class ConfigurationContextImpl
extends Object
implements ConfigurationContext

    Helper class for enabling functional constructs with Configurations and exposes the felix.fileinstall.filename property, if it exists, as a File.

    Reasons a getConfigFile() call would return null:

    • There was no dictionary of properties associated with the config
    • There was no felix.fileinstall.filename property
    • The felix.fileinstall.filename property was invalid
    See FELIX-4005 & FELIX-4556. This class cannot utilize Java 8 language constructs due to maven bundle plugin 2.3.7

      • getConfigFile

        public File getConfigFile()
        Specified by:
        getConfigFile in interface ConfigurationContext
        Returns:
        a File in the etc directory that defines this config if and only if the config was created by the Felix directory watcher. Returns null otherwise.
